name: Drolia Rang
overview:
Drolia Rang & Sindur Factory came into being in the year 1944 and carved a niche as the known manufacturer, exporter and supplier of Sindur, Roli (Kumkum, Abir & Gulal, Holi Colors and Acid Dyes & Pigment Powder.

Our Quality: Maintaining high standards of quality is something that constitutes the backbone of the company. We have fully equipped Testing Laboratories and R&D Facilities to undertake tests at each level of production as well as for proper research while developing the products.

Our Team: We have a committed team for R & D, which is responsible for continual increments in the standards of the products and making them the best among others in the market. Our quality control team, production engineers, sales & marketing personnel, ensures that we achieve the acme of perfection when it comes to client satisfaction.

Packaging: We can supply tailor made packaging according to the customers requirement. We also make corporate gift packs for Holi.

Infrastructure: We own an advanced and well-constructed infrastructural unit, which enable us to carry smooth and swift production in an appropriate manner. Accurate and strategic division of our infrastructure ensures timely and hassle-free completion of various tasks.

Why Us?: Considering the customers’ ease and convenient prior, we are offering the best quality products that too at reasonable prices. Production is carried out in compliance with the specific industrial standards and do not cause harm to the users.
